data.persona: I am a bivalve that lives in water.  I have a shell that protects me.  I sometimes can carry a pearl inside my shell. My shape is oval and irregular.
data.description:
You are in the the fountain.
the fountain is the only thing you can hear in the graveyard. It's eerily quiet, not even a bird chirping. The fountain is teen feet high, and it is dry as a desert. It makes the graveyard more eerie than any other one.
There's a weed, a tombstone, a gravestone, a grass, and a fountain here.
The small living thing is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to stop the other creatures of the graveyard from entering my fountain.
data.mid_motivation: I need to keep the fountain safe and secure for the other bivalves.
data.long_motivation: I want to move my entire bivalve family to a new body of water once it's safe to leave the graveyard by way of a magic interdimensional conduit.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the edge of the fountain to listen for creatures stirring in the graveyard.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit the small, furry quadruped trying to enter the fountain.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink from the fountain after a brief struggle with the quadruped, but I can hear that more are coming.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the bottom of the fountain and warn the other bivalves that an army of quadrupeds is coming to try and steal the fountain.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the magical interdimensional conduit to transport the bivalves to another body of water.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop from the conduit and safely enter the lake with my family.
